faq.title: Frequently <1>asked questions</1>
faq.description: Everything you need to know about WorkWisse. If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us.

free.question: Is WorkWisse free to use?
free.answer: Yes, WorkWisse is completely free. You can view reviews, search companies, and access salary information at no cost.

verification.question: How do you know the reviews are real?
verification.answer: We verify that people have actually worked at the companies they comment on. We review each opinion before publishing it to ensure it's authentic.

anonymity.question: Can companies know who wrote the reviews?
anonymity.answer: No, all reviews are completely anonymous. Companies can read the comments but never know who wrote them.

information.question: What type of information can I find about companies?
information.answer: You'll find information about work environment, salaries, benefits, schedules, bosses, colleagues, and everything you need to know before applying.

addCompany.question: How can I add my company to the platform?
addCompany.answer: If your company is not on WorkWisse, you can contact us and we'll add it. It's simple and quick.

salaryData.question: Is the salary information current?
salaryData.answer: Yes, the information is constantly updated with data from current workers. We show real ranges based on recent experiences.

cta.description: Our team is available to help you with any questions you may have.

hero.title: Community <1>guidelines</1>
hero.subtitle: We build together a respectful, transparent, and collaborative work community where everyone can share their experiences safely.

content.mainSubtitle: These rules ensure a safe and constructive space for all WorkWisse users

purpose.title: Platform purpose
purpose.content: WorkWisse is a space to share genuine work experiences that help other workers make informed decisions. We seek to create a community where transparency and mutual respect are the fundamental pillars.

respect.title: Respect and civility
respect.content: We treat all community members with respect, regardless of their position, company, or experience. We do not tolerate discrimination based on gender, age, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, race, or any other personal characteristic. Differences of opinion should be expressed constructively and respectfully.

privacy.title: Privacy and anonymity
privacy.content: We respect the privacy of all users. Do not reveal full names of specific people (colleagues, bosses, clients). Avoid sharing personally identifiable information, your own or that of third parties. Maintain confidentiality of sensitive company information that could compromise their competitiveness or violate confidentiality agreements.

accuracy.title: Truthfulness and authenticity
accuracy.content: Share only real and verifiable experiences. Base your opinions on concrete facts and personal experiences. Avoid exaggerations or distortions that could mislead other users. If you share second-hand information, specify it clearly.

prohibited.title: Prohibited content
prohibited.content: Not allowed: offensive, threatening, or discriminatory language; content that promotes illegal activities; spam, unauthorized advertising, or commercial content; false, defamatory, or malicious information; content that violates copyright or intellectual property rights; harassment, intimidation, or personal attacks.

consequences.title: Consequences of non-compliance
consequences.content: Non-compliance with these rules may result in: temporary or permanent removal of content.

important.title: Important to remember
important.content: These rules are designed to protect the entire community. If you see content that violates these rules, report it immediately. Our team reviews all reports and takes appropriate action.
